game-intro.content: Kids, I need your help! I'm pet-sitting for Fluff the Rhino (who's isn't small OR a pet, ahh!), and I have to keep him busy so Blossom won't find out.

game-intro-mission.content: Help me dress up Fluff so he's ready for our adventures!

menu-choose-alt.content: Which adventure do you want to try?

menu-locked-alt.content: Play all the open levels to unlock this one!

level-intro-rainyday.content: It's raining outside! Cover Fluff in something WATERPROOF so he won't get wet.

level-intro-workitout.content: Fluff wants to exercise. Cover him in something STRETCHY. Stretchy things get longer or bigger when you pull on them, but don't break.

level-intro-zoo.content: Fluff wants to visit the penguins at the zoo. Cover him in something WARM so he doesn?t get cold.

level-intro-apple-picking.content: Fluff is going apple picking! Cover him in something HARD so falling apples won't hurt him.

level-intro-laser-tag.content: Fluff is going to a disco dance party! Cover him in something SHINY the light will bounce off.

level-intro-nap-time.content: Chet needs a comfy place to sleep. Cover Fluff in something SOFT so Chet will stay asleep.

level-intro-rafting-rhino.content: Fluff wants to play in the water. Cover him in something that FLOATS.

level-intro-hide-seek.content: Fluff and I are going to a dress up party in a garden. Cover him in something that grows.

level-intro-pup-pals.content: I want to disguise Fluff as a Pulli dog! Cover him in something SHAGGY so he looks like a Pulli dog.

level-intro-big-spill.content: Fluff is helping me clean up a big mess! Cover him in something that SOAKS UP liquid.

level-intro-camping-trip.content: Fluff is sleeping in a tent outside! Cover him in something WARM and SOFT.

level-intro-robo-rhino.content: Fluff wants to be a robot for Halloween. Cover him in something HARD and SHINY.

level-intro-sea-story.content: Fluff is going swimming in the ocean! Cover him in something that FLOATS and is WATERPROOF.

level-intro-superscuba.content: Fluff is going scuba diving! Cover him in something STRETCHY and WATERPROOF to keep him dry while he swims.

level-intro-rhino-run.content: Fluff wants to jog outside in the winter. Cover him in something WARM and STRETCHY.

level-intro-smoothie-spill.content: Fluff spilled his smoothie and needs to clean it up. Cover him in something SHAGGY?that SOAKS UP.

material-info-plasticbags.content: Plastic bags are thin and bendy.

material-info-sponge.content: Sponges are soft, light things with little holes in them that we use for cleaning up.

material-info-paper.content: Paper is something you write on or use to wrap things. The pages of a book are made of paper.

material-info-rubber.content: Rubber is a strong, elastic material. It's used for making things like balloons and bouncy balls.

material-info-wood.content: Wood is the hard material you get from trees.

material-info-feathers.content: Feathers are what cover a bird's body. Most birds have feathers.

material-info-steel.content: Steel is a strong, silvery metal. It's used to make things like bridges and cars.

material-info-cloth.content: Cloth can be wool or cotton -- our clothes are often made from it.

material-info-bricks.content: bricks are clay blocks used to make walls and sidewalks.

material-info-mops.content: mops are made by weaving or braiding yarn together.

material-info-leaves.content: Leaves are found on plants like flowers, bushes, and trees.

draw-intro-new.content: Tap the MATERIAL you think Fluff should wear for his adventure!

draw-material-definition.content: A material is the stuff that things are made of.

draw-cover.content: Tap on Fluff and then color him with the material.

draw-tried-all.content: You tried all the materials before testing them. I love your curiosity!

draw-needmore.content: You need to draw on MORE of Fluff.

draw-idle.content: Choose the material that's right for the job!

tap-test.content: Tap Blossom when you're ready to test Fluff's outfit.

property-definition.content: A property describes how a material looks, feels, smells, sounds, or tastes.

tap-table.content: Tap here to see your CHART.

tap-table-alt.content: Tap here to see your TABLE.

table-definition.content: Your chart shows all the materials you test and what they can do.

table-definition-alt.content: Your table shows all the materials you test and what they can do.

test-intro.content: Let's test Fluff's outfit. Testing will help you see if you picked the right material.

test-whatdoyouthink.content: What do you think will happen when you test this material?

test-whatdoyoupredict.content: What do you predict will happen when you test this material?

test-property-2.content: Now it's time for second test!

test-prompt-waterproof.content: Drag the hose to squirt Fluff with water!

test-prompt-stretchy.content: Tap Fluff to make him jump rope!

test-prompt-hard.content: Tap to shake apples off the tree!

test-prompt-shiny.content: Tap the disco ball to shine light at Fluff!

test-prompt-soft.content: Tap Chet to try to wake him up!

test-prompt-float.content: Tap the tank to fill it with water!

test-prompt-natural.content: Drag the hose to squirt Fluff with water to see if his outfit grows!

test-prompt-shaggy.content: Tap the dogs to see if Fluff blends in!

test-prompt-soaks.content: Tap the glass to pour juice on Fluff!

test-notice-shiny-no.content: The light is NOT bouncing off.

test-notice-soft-alt.content: If the material is soft, then Chet will stay asleep. If it is hard, then Chet will wake up because he's uncomfortable.

test-notice-waterproof-yes.content: The water is falling on the floor.

test-notice-soak-no.content: The juice is falling on the floor.

tap-button-document.content: Tap the button to write down, or document, what happened.

lets-document-alt.content: Tap the button to document what happened.

test-feedback-success7.content: This is a chart. It shows each thing you tested and if it did the right job.

test-feedback-success7-alt.content: This is a table. It shows each thing you tested and if it did the right job.

table-result-feathers-warm.content: You found out that FEATHERS are WARM.

table-result-steel-not-warm.content: You found out that STEEL is NOT warm.

table-result-plasticbags-not-warm.content: You found out that PLASTIC BAGS are NOT warm.

test-feedback-fail1.content: Why do you think that material didn't work?

test-feedback-success6.content: Awesome documenting skills! Your chart is filling up with results from all your tests.

test-feedback-success6-alt.content: Awesome documenting skills! Your table is filling up with results from all your tests.

test-feedback-success5.content: I can see your work is paying off. You're really getting this!

test-feedback-success1.content: Nice testing! You dressed Fluff in the best material. Why do you think it worked?

test-feedback-success3.content: Nice job testing different materials to see what works!

test-kept-trying.content: You kept trying until you got it right!

table-testmore.content: What else can you test? Tap an empty spot to test that material.

[use test table test results audio as ab.content: You found out that (MATERIAL) is/is not (PROPERTY).

payoff-feathers-warm-soft.content: You found out that FEATHERS are WARM and SOFT.

payoff-steel-hard-shiny.content: You found out that STEEL is HARD and SHINY.

payoff-wood-waterproof-floats.content: You found out that WOOD is WATERPROOF and FLOATS.

payoff-rubber-stretchy-waterproof.content: You found out that RUBBER is STRETCHY and WATERPROOF.

payoff-cloth-warm-stretchy.content: You found out that CLOTH is WARM and STRETCHY.

payoff-mops-shaggy-soaks-up.content: You found out that mops are SHAGGY and SOAK UP.

payoff-why.content: Why do you think that is?

payoff-wonder.content: I wonder why that material worked?

payoff-extra-bighelp.content: Awesome! You were a big help!

hint-materials-different-property.content: Materials have different property -- that's how they look, feel, smell, sound, or taste.

hint-materials-multiple-property.content: Materials can have more than one property.

hint-materials-different-things.content: Materials can be used to do and make different things.

hint-try-different.content: Try a different material and see what happens!

prompt-help-table.content: Do you think it would help to use your chart?

prompt-help-table-alt.content: Do you think it would help to use your table?

prompt-table-predict.content: How could your table help you predict what to try next?

level-intro-sea-storm.content: Fluff is going swimming in the ocean.
Cover him in something that FLOATS, and is WATERPROOF.

level-intro-atthezoo.content: Fluff wants to visit the penguins at the zoo.
Cover him in something WARM, so he doesn't get cold.

level-intro-garden-party.content: Fluff and I are going to a dress-up party in a garden.
Cover him in something that GROWS.

test-property2.content: Now it's time for a second test.
